context.p: Use the right-side navbar on the Test Case Details page to access Advanced Options for better management and grouping of test cases while creating Test Suites and Test Plans and to improve understanding of test coverage.

step.cmd: Click Test Case Info in the right-side navbar. You can update Test Case Name and view description from there and view information about the Test Cases creation and last update.
Click Ad-Hoc Runs in the right-side navbar. This will enable you to view the history and details of Ad-Hoc runs results for the Test Case.
